name: part_002
file: tmp_【Ayunda Risu 3D Birthday】The Rise of the NUT Warrior 【#TheNutWarrior】 [VYSAfYJ6FhI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Ayunda Risu and Nerissa Ravencroft perform the song "Lion".

subtitles.original: ライオン
subtitles.english: Lion

subtitles.original: 星を廻せ 世界の真ん中で
subtitles.english: Spin the stars in the center of the world

subtitles.original: くしゃみすれば どこかの森で 蝶が乱舞
subtitles.english: If you sneeze, butterflies dance in some forest

subtitles.original: 君が守る ドアの鍵 デタラメ
subtitles.english: The key to the door you protect is a lie

subtitles.original: 恥ずかしいほど 窓際にならべあうよ
subtitles.english: Lined up by the window, almost embarrassingly so

subtitles.original: ライオンは強い
subtitles.english: Lions are strong

subtitles.original: 生き残りたい 生き残りたい
subtitles.english: I want to survive, I want to survive

subtitles.original: まだ生きていたくなる
subtitles.english: I still want to be alive

subtitles.original: 星座の導きで いま 見つめあった
subtitles.english: Led by the constellations, we gazed at each other

subtitles.original: 生き残りたい 途方に暮れて
subtitles.english: I want to survive, feeling lost

subtitles.original: キラリ 枯れてゆく
subtitles.english: Shining as I wither away

subtitles.original: 本気の身体見せつけるまで
subtitles.english: Until I show you my true form

subtitles.original: 私 眠らない
subtitles.english: I will not sleep

subtitles.original: 風はやがて 東へ向かうだろう
subtitles.english: Soon the wind will head for the east

subtitles.original: 高気圧 この星の 氷河を溶かす
subtitles.english: High pressure melts this planet's glaciers

subtitles.original: 誘い水を 飲んだ胸が熱い
subtitles.english: My chest burns from the water that beckoned me

subtitles.original: 遠巻きな 物語
subtitles.english: A distant story

subtitles.original: かじりあう 骨の髄まで
subtitles.english: Chewing on each other to the bone

subtitles.original: 生き残りたい 生き残りたい
subtitles.english: I want to survive, I want to survive

subtitles.original: まだ生きていたくなる
subtitles.english: I still want to be alive

subtitles.original: 星座の導きで いま 見つめあった
subtitles.english: Led by the constellations, we gazed at each other

subtitles.original: 生き残りたい 途方に暮れて
subtitles.english: I want to survive, feeling lost

subtitles.original: キラリ 枯れてゆく
subtitles.english: Shining as I wither away

subtitles.original: 本気の身体見せつけるまで
subtitles.english: Until I show you my true form

subtitles.original: 私 眠らない
subtitles.english: I will not sleep

subtitles.original: We shouted to survive!
subtitles.english: We shouted to survive!

subtitles.original: We shouted to survive!
subtitles.english: We shouted to survive!

subtitles.original: 何しに生まれたの
subtitles.english: Why was I born?

subtitles.original: 何しにここにいる
subtitles.english: Why am I here?

subtitles.original: 生き残りたい 埋まらない傷
subtitles.english: I want to survive, with wounds that won't heal

subtitles.original: 光 恐れてた
subtitles.english: I was afraid of the light

subtitles.original: 許された命が いま 惹かれあった
subtitles.english: Now, these forgiven lives are drawn to each other

subtitles.original: 彷徨い果てて 君の隣で
subtitles.english: After wandering aimlessly, by your side

subtitles.original: ほてり 静めて
subtitles.english: I'll cool my fever

subtitles.original: 本気の奏で見せつけるまで
subtitles.english: Until I show you my true performance

subtitles.original: 私 眠らない
subtitles.english: I will not sleep

subtitles.original: 生き残りたい 崖っぷちでいい
subtitles.english: I want to survive, even if on the edge

subtitles.original: 君を愛してる
subtitles.english: I love you

subtitles.original: 目覚めたいと 叫ぶ世界
subtitles.english: The world screams that it wants to wake up

subtitles.original: いま 惹かれあった
subtitles.english: Now we are drawn to each other

subtitles.original: 狂気に変えて 祈り捧ぐよ
subtitles.english: Turning it into madness, I offer my prayers

subtitles.original: 君を愛してる
subtitles.english: I love you

subtitles.original: 星座の導きで
subtitles.english: Led by the constellations

subtitles.original: 生き残りたい まだ生きていたい
subtitles.english: I want to survive, I still want to be alive

subtitles.original: 君を愛してる
subtitles.english: I love you

subtitles.original: 本気の心見せつけるまで
subtitles.english: Until I show you my true heart

subtitles.original: 私 眠らない
subtitles.english: I will not sleep
